textBeforeTable: Sparkle products are RoHS-compliant, effectively reducing the environmental impact by restricting the use of lead, mercury and certain other hazardous substances in the products. NVIDIA® PureVideo™ HD Technology NVIDIA CUDA™ Technology is the world’s only C language environment that provides access to processing power of NVIDIA GPUs.
